channel.title: Bank colours AND 1 ERROR ! HELP PLEASE! PLEASE =[!
channel.description:
Please guys! This is my first autoer (ALMOST WORKING!!!) !!! im so excited!2 things wrong... it auto loggs in for me, then i have to stop it, to click the (CLIK HERE TO PLAY BUTTON) then i start it again, and it changes all the chat options (COOL) ... then rs freezes for 10 seconds, and its fine after, in ma SCAR it says...
Could Not Get Bank Color.. Restart Script
How do i change the bank colour, can someone like giv me a tut?... and btw..i havent a clue what bank colour is so..... i know its somethin to do with that wierd cursor on SCAR.. but i dont know where to put it on rs... so can someone tell me where exactly to put it? for auto flax picker?? PLEASE!!!!
My second error is, it doesn't say [Error] it says [Hint]...
Line 174: [Hint] (187:43): Variable 'NEWLINE' never used in script C:\PROGRAM FILES\SCAR 2.03\includes\srl\srl\core\Globals.scar
Everytime i start my SCAR.... is that a problem?
[b][u]POST ABOUT BANK COLOUR PLEASE[/u][/b]

item.title: Bank colours AND 1 ERROR ! HELP PLEASE! PLEASE =[!
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

Line 174: [Hint] (187:43): Variable 'NEWLINE' never used in script C:\PROGRAM FILES\SCAR 2.03\includes\srl\srl\core\Globals.scar

That isn’t a problem, it just says that the variable ‘Newline’, wich you can find in Globals.scar is useless.

Read full topic

item.source: Bank colours AND 1 ERROR ! HELP PLEASE! PLEASE =[!

item.title: Bank colours AND 1 ERROR ! HELP PLEASE! PLEASE =[!
item.dc:creator: @Dregen Dregen
item.description:
@Dregen wrote:

[quote=“X-J-K-X, post:1, topic:121425”]Please guys! This is my first autoer (ALMOST WORKING!!!) !!! im so excited!2 things wrong… it auto loggs in for me, then i have to stop it, to click the (CLIK HERE TO PLAY BUTTON) then i start it again, and it changes all the chat options (COOL) … then rs freezes for 10 seconds, and its fine after, in ma SCAR it says…

Could Not Get Bank Color… Restart Script

How do i change the bank colour, can someone like giv me a tut?.. and btw…i havent a clue what bank colour is so… i know its somethin to do with that wierd cursor on SCAR… but i dont know where to put it on rs… so can someone tell me where exactly to put it? for auto flax picker?? PLEASE!!!

My second error is, it doesn’t say [Error] it says [Hint]…

Line 174: [Hint] (187:43): Variable ‘NEWLINE’ never used in script C:\PROGRAM FILES\SCAR 2.03\includes\srl\srl\core\Globals.scar

Everytime i start my SCAR… is that a problem?

POST ABOUT BANK COLOUR PLEASE[/quote]

I assume that the Bank Color is the color of the bank symbol on the minimap, and to edit it you would have to go into your SRL scripts and edit them (which wouldn’t be a very good idea).

What do you mean about the cursor? Do you mean the target thing that you put on the RuneScape window? If you do, then Restore Down, which is the button with the 2 windows on top of each other on the top right of the program by the X (you may have it restored down already, if you can manually move the window around). Then move your SCAR screen to the right or left so you can see the square area where you play on the RuneScape screen, not the black area, and then take the target and drag it to the play area. Problem solved (I hope).

The second “error” you were talking about… Don’t worry about it, it won’t cause any problems. It’s just telling you that in the SRL script a variable wasn’t used.

I hope this helped you out.

Read full topic
